verses.verse: Judge <WG2919> not <WG3361> , that <WG3363> ye be <WG2919> not <WG3363> judged <WG2919> .

For <WG1722> with <WG3739> what <WG1063> judgment <WG2917> ye judge <WG2919> , ye shall be judged <WG2919> : and <WG2532> with <WG1722> what <WG3739> measure <WG3358> ye mete <WG3354> , it shall be measured <WG488> to you <WG5213> again <WG488> .

And <WG1161> why <WG5101> beholdest <WG991> thou the mote <WG2595> that is in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> brother's <WG80> eye <WG3788> , but <WG1161> considerest <WG2657> not <WG3756> the beam <WG1385> that is in <WG1722> thine own <WG4674> eye <WG3788> ?

Or <WG2228> how <WG4459> wilt thou say <WG2046> to thy <WG4675> brother <WG80> , Let <WG863> me pull out <WG1544> the mote <WG2595> out of <WG575> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788> ; and <WG2532> , behold <WG2400> , a beam <WG1385> is in <WG1722> thine own <WG4675> eye <WG3788> ?

Thou hypocrite <WG5273> , first <WG4412> cast out <WG1544> the beam <WG1385> out of <WG1537> thine own <WG4675> eye <WG3788> ; and <WG2532> then <WG5119> shalt thou see clearly <WG1227> to cast out <WG1544> the mote <WG2595> out of <WG1537> thy <WG4675> brother's <WG80> eye <WG3788> .

¶ Give <WG1325> not <WG3361> that which <WG3588> is holy <WG40> unto the dogs <WG2965> , neither <WG3366> cast <WG906> ye your <WG5216> pearls <WG3135> before <WG1715> swine <WG5519> , lest <WG3379> they trample <WG2662> them <WG846> under <WG1722> their <WG846> feet <WG4228> , and <WG2532> turn again <WG4762> and rend <WG4486> you <WG5209> .

¶ Ask <WG154> , and <WG2532> it shall be given <WG1325> you <WG5213> ; seek <WG2212> , and <WG2532> ye shall find <WG2147> ; knock <WG2925> , and <WG2532> it shall be opened <WG455> unto you <WG5213> :

For <WG1063> every one <WG3956> that asketh <WG154> receiveth <WG2983> ; and <WG2532> he that seeketh <WG2212> findeth <WG2147> ; and <WG2532> to him that knocketh <WG2925> it shall be opened <WG455> .

Or <WG2228> what <WG5101> man <WG444> is <WG2076> there of <WG1537> you <WG5216> , whom <WG3739> if <WG1437> his <WG846> son <WG5207> ask <WG154> bread <WG740> , will he give <WG3361> <WG1929> him <WG846> a stone <WG3037> ?
Or <WG2532> if <WG1437> he ask <WG154> a fish <WG2486> , will he give <WG3361> <WG1929> him <WG846> a serpent <WG3789> ?

If <WG1487> ye <WG5210> then <WG3767> , being <WG5607> evil <WG4190> , know <WG1492> how to give <WG1325> good <WG18> gifts <WG1390> unto your <WG5216> children <WG5043> , how much <WG4214> more <WG3123> shall your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> give <WG1325> good things <WG18> to them that ask <WG154> him <WG846> ?

Therefore <WG3767> all things <WG3956> whatsoever <WG302> <WG3745> ye would <WG2309> that <WG2443> men <WG444> should do <WG4160> to you <WG5213> , do <WG4160> ye <WG5210> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> to them <WG846> : for <WG1063> this <WG3778> is <WG2076> the law <WG3551> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396> .

¶ Enter ye in <WG1525> at <WG1223> the strait <WG4728> gate <WG4439> : for <WG3754> wide <WG4116> is the gate <WG4439> , and <WG2532> broad <WG2149> is the way <WG3598> , that leadeth <WG520> to <WG1519> destruction <WG684> , and <WG2532> many <WG4183> there be <WG1526> which <WG3588> go in <WG1525> thereat <WG1223> <WG846> :

Because <WG3754> strait <WG4728> is the gate <WG4439> , and <WG2532> narrow <WG2346> is the way <WG3598> , which <WG3588> leadeth <WG520> unto <WG1519> life <WG2222> , and <WG2532> few <WG3641> there be <WG1526> that find <WG2147> it <WG846> .

¶ Beware <WG1161> <WG4337> of <WG575> false prophets <WG5578> , which <WG3748> come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> sheep's <WG4263> clothing <WG1742> , but <WG1161> inwardly <WG2081> they are <WG1526> ravening <WG727> wolves <WG3074> .

Ye shall know <WG1921> them <WG846> by <WG575> their <WG846> fruits <WG2590> <WG3385> . Do men gather <WG4816> grapes <WG4718> of <WG575> thorns <WG173> , or <WG2228> figs <WG4810> of <WG575> thistles <WG5146> ?

Even so <WG3779> every <WG3956> good <WG18> tree <WG1186> bringeth forth <WG4160> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590> ; but <WG1161> a corrupt <WG4550> tree <WG1186> bringeth forth <WG4160> evil <WG4190> fruit <WG2590> .

A good <WG18> tree <WG1186> cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> bring forth <WG4160> evil <WG4190> fruit <WG2590> , neither <WG3761> can a corrupt <WG4550> tree <WG1186> bring forth <WG4160> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590> .
Every <WG3956> tree <WG1186> that bringeth <WG4160> not <WG3361> forth <WG4160> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590> is hewn down <WG1581> , and <WG2532> cast <WG906> into <WG1519> the fire <WG4442> .
Wherefore <WG686> by <WG575> their <WG846> fruits <WG2590> ye shall know <WG1921> them <WG846> .

¶ Not <WG3756> every one <WG3956> that saith <WG3004> unto me <WG3427> , Lord <WG2962> , Lord <WG2962> , shall enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> ; but <WG235> he that doeth <WG4160> the will <WG2307> of my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> which is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> .

Many <WG4183> will say <WG2046> to me <WG3427> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> , Lord <WG2962> , Lord <WG2962> , have we <WG4395> not <WG3756> prophesied <WG4395> in thy <WG4674> name <WG3686> ? and <WG2532> in thy <WG4674> name <WG3686> have cast out <WG1544> devils <WG1140> ? and <WG2532> in thy <WG4674> name <WG3686> done <WG4160> many <WG4183> wonderful works <WG1411> ?

And <WG2532> then <WG5119> will I profess <WG3670> unto them <WG846> <WG3754> , I never <WG3763> knew <WG1097> you <WG5209> : depart <WG672> from <WG575> me <WG1700> , ye that work <WG2038> iniquity <WG458> .

¶ Therefore <WG3767> whosoever <WG3956> <WG3748> heareth <WG191> these <WG5128> sayings <WG3056> of mine <WG3450> , and <WG2532> doeth <WG4160> them <WG846> , I will liken <WG3666> him <WG846> unto a wise <WG5429> man <WG435> , which <WG3748> built <WG3618> his <WG846> house <WG3614> upon <WG1909> a rock <WG4073> :

And <WG2532> the rain <WG1028> descended <WG2597> , and <WG2532> the floods <WG4215> came <WG2064> , and <WG2532> the winds <WG417> blew <WG4154> , and <WG2532> beat upon <WG4363> that <WG1565> house <WG3614> ; and <WG2532> it fell <WG4098> not <WG3756> : for <WG1063> it was founded <WG2311> upon <WG1909> a rock <WG4073> .

And <WG2532> every one <WG3956> that heareth <WG191> these <WG5128> sayings <WG3056> of mine <WG3450> , and <WG2532> doeth <WG4160> them <WG846> not <WG3361> , shall be likened <WG3666> unto a foolish <WG3474> man <WG435> , which <WG3748> built <WG3618> his <WG846> house <WG3614> upon <WG1909> the sand <WG285> :

And <WG2532> the rain <WG1028> descended <WG2597> , and <WG2532> the floods <WG4215> came <WG2064> , and <WG2532> the winds <WG417> blew <WG4154> , and <WG2532> beat upon <WG4350> that <WG1565> house <WG3614> ; and <WG2532> it fell <WG4098> : and <WG2532> great <WG3173> was <WG2258> the fall <WG4431> of it <WG846> .

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, when <WG3753> Jesus <WG2424> had ended <WG4931> these <WG5128> sayings <WG3056>, the people <WG3793> were astonished <WG1605> at <WG1909> his <WG846> doctrine <WG1322>:
For <WG1063> he taught <WG1321> <WG2258> them <WG846> as <WG5613> one having <WG2192> authority <WG1849>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> as <WG5613> the scribes <WG1122>.
